modName: Vals Crafting Meltdown Alpha - Melting Smelting and Fletchin
summary: Melt down weapons and armor into raw materials. Go Full Metal Acl and transmute new ore. Create scrolls. And Craft arrows.
descriptionHtml:
THIS MOD NOW EXSISTS ON SKYRIM SE. PLS. STOP THE SPAM.

https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/14958



Author Update 9/2/2013.

It's been a long time since I've posted here or made any update to this mod at all, and I feel that's not going to change much.

The reason for this is after trying to recreate the mod in the creation kit I realized that little would be gained from actually doing it (as the limitations for recipes are still the same) and that entering new entrys would actually be faster using the Skyrim Wiki page and TESsnip (like i originally did) which sadly further forcing me away from rebuilding this mod.

However that's not the only reason. In addition to working full time while trying to pay for collage I am also working on a fairly large project outside of the Skyrim Community.

Although I can't mention what exactly the project is I can say that it does involve creating an online TCG. (Not Hearthstone)

And having said all that I'd like to take the time to thank all of you who have kept using this mod over the years despite it's "Clunkyness" and "dirty edits". The reasons for me actually creating this mod wasn't just to help myself but to enhance the enjoyment of players around the world in what ever way I could. Because in the end I enjoy helping people and trying to make there lives better. (And I know some of you just laughed hysterically hearing that from me).

I would also like to thank a few people who may not ever see this update but your names should not just be mentioned at the bottom of this page but also praised for the work you did in helping me create something special that has helped people for over a year now. Crivil, franchiceddhu90, JanGG1, Narga88, ALEKSSANDROS, Kestle, Zilvereyes, and jediakyrol to you all I extend my thanks in the work you have done. This mod would not have been the same without your help and I hope that you can find as much pride and joy in this mod as I do because this mod is just as equally yours as it is mine.

Sincerely, Valdosa.

P.S. I do play League of Legends in what little spare time I have these days. Feel free to add me. Summoner names Valdosa.



This Mod as been optimized for use with

Lost Art of the Blacksmith
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1020

And

More Craftables
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=799

I Strongly Encourage you to download those.

If like crafting be sure to check this mod http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2682 for more Dragon Priest Crafting goodness. ]

And no, I don't have a fancy list or colorful pictures for my front page or a list of everything craftable. What I do have however is a mod that does what is says it does.


(BACK TO THE FRONT PAGE!)

--The concept of this mod is simple. To add crafting features to Skyrim that should have been added but for one reason or another they were not.

These features added by this mod include

----Melting Down Armor back into raw materials----
-Steel-
-Glass-
-Ebony-
-Dwarven(Dwmer)-
-Elven-
-Orcish-
-Falmar-

----Crafting Leather out of Leather Armor----
--Leather Armor--
--Hide Armor--
--Scale Armor--
--Light Imperial Armor--
--Stormcloak Armor--
--Forsworn Armor
--Theives Guild
--Fur Armor
--Night Scale
--AND MORE!--

----Melting Down Weapons back into raw materials----

-Steel-[Daggers, Swords, Axes, Maces, Greatswords, Battleaxes, Warhammers, Bows, and Shields]
-Glass-[Daggers, Swords, Axes, Maces, Greatswords, Battleaxes, Warhammers, Bows, and Shields]
-Ebony-[Daggers, Swords, Axes, Maces, Greatswords, Battleaxes, Warhammers, Bows, and Shields]
-Dwarven(Dwmer)-[Daggers, Swords, Axes, Maces, Greatswords, Battleaxes, Warhammers, Bows, and Shields]
-Elven-[Daggers, Swords, Axes, Maces, Greatswords, Battleaxes, Warhammers, Bows, and Shields]
-Orcish-[Daggers, Swords, Axes, Maces, Greatswords, Battleaxes, Warhammers, Bows, and Shields]
-Falmar-[Swords, Axes, Bows, Shields, Armor]
-Forsworn-[Swords, Axes, Shields, Bows, Armor]
-Legendary (Artifacts) (Wuuthrad, Eye of Magnus ect)


----Fletching Arrows from Firewood, Feathers, and Ingots-----


----Melting Down useless "MISC" Items----
--Lanterns--
--Goblets--
--Platters--
--Plates--
--Trogs--
--Hammers--
--Tongs--
--Spoons--
--Candle Sticks--
--And more (Yes, I added so many I forgot the rest)--

----Tear up MISC Items and Wooden Bows into Crafting Materials----
--Wooden Plates--
--Buckets--
--Burned Books--
--Ruined Books--
--Wooden Bowls--
--Other Wooden Objects--
--Imperial Bows--
--Hunting Bows--
--Troll Skulls to Bone-Meal--
--Skulls to Bone-Meal--
--Mammoth Tusks to Bone-Meal & Powder--
--Tusks to Bone-Meal--
--Tankards--
--Kettles--
--Cast Iron Pans--
--Lanterns--

----Smelt Down Gold/Silver Rings & Amulets----

----Smelt Down Stolen Jewelry to safely make off with the gems----

----And Soon to Be much more----
--Scrolls--
--Skill Books--
--Weapons--
--Mounts--
--Armors--
--and More items--

--Hall of Honor--

---Translators---
Crivil
franchiceddhu90
JanGG1
Narga88
ALEKSSANDROS
Kestle

--Allies--
Crivil
Zilvereyes
jediakyrol

So stay tuned and try to keep me going! Cause my eyes hurt with all this hex WTB CREATION KIT ALREADY!
author: Valdosa
